metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35730 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An XSS issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.2.13, 1.3.x before 1.3.16, and 1.4.x before 1.4.10. The attacker can send a plain text e-mail message, with JavaScript in a link reference element that is mishandled by linkref_addindex in rcube_string_replacer.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
